amendment.description: Amendment sought to create additional work requirements for Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (SNAP) recipients and raise the total reduction in spending to $31 billion.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 101 printed in Part B of House Report 113-117 to create additional work requirements for SNAP recipients and raises the total reduction in spending to $31 billion.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Huelskamp amendment (A055) Failed by recorded vote: 175 - 250 (Roll no. 283).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Huelskamp amendment (A055) Failed by recorded vote: 175 - 250 (Roll no. 283).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A055) offered by Mr. Huelskamp.
